bird: often perched on a branch or wire
may have a nest or food nearby
varies in size, shape, and color depending on the species
boat: hull made of wood, metal, or fiberglass
moored to a dock or floating on water
navigation equipment such as steering wheel or compass
bottle: a container made of glass, plastic, or ceramic material
hollow body with an open top
narrow neck and a wider body
a label or branding on the body
a cap or lid to seal the opening
cat: a small to medium-sized, typically furry, carnivorous mammal
usually orange, black, white, or a combination of these colors.
chair: typically has a back and four legs
designed for one person to sit
may have a distinct pattern or design
cow: black, white, brown, or a combination of these colors
large body with a prominent abdomen
a subtle hump on the back
dog: varying sizes and shapes depending on breed
common colors include brown, black, white, grey, or a combination
horse: brown, black, white, or gray in color
long neck and head with a muzzle
person: human-like face with eyes, nose, and mouth
clothes or other forms of attire
potted-plant: a container or pot made of ceramic, plastic, or other materials
one or more plants with leaves, stems, and possibly flowers or fruits
a distinct boundary between the plant and the surrounding environment
possibly a saucer or tray underneath the pot
varying shapes, sizes, and colors of the pot and plant
sheep: typically white or light brown fleece
rounded body shape with a distinctive coat pattern
a distinctive head shape with a short, blunt snout
often found in a pastoral or rural setting
background: often blurry or out of focus
lacks clear edges or defined shape
may include elements such as sky, walls, floors, gardens, etc.
often serves as a context for the main subject of the image
can include natural elements such as trees, flowers, or clouds
can include architectural elements such as buildings, doors, or windows
does not have a distinct object-like presence
